rukus.text: 16|61|Va agar Alloh taolo mardumro ʙa xotiri zulmaşon ʙozxost mekard, çunʙandae rūji zamin ʙoqī nameguzoşt; vale [kajfari] ononro to zamoni muajjan ʙa ta'xir meandozad; va cun açalaşon ʙa sar ojad, na soate [az on] ta'xir mekunand va na peşī megirand

16|62|Va [muşrikon] on ciro xuş nadorand ʙaroi Alloh taolo qaror medihand va zaʙonaşon [cunin] durūƣ mesozad, ki [rasttagorī va] nakuī az oni eşon ast. Haqqo, ki otaş nasiʙaşon ast va onon, hatman, az peşgomon [-i duzax] hastand

16|63|[Ej pajomʙar] Savgand ʙa Alloh taolo, ki ʙa sūi ummathoe, ki peş az tu ʙudand, [niz pajomʙarone] firistodem; pas, şajton korhojaşonro ʙarojaşon orost; az in rū, imrūz [niz dūst va] korsozaşon ham ūst va ʙarojaşon azoʙe dardnok [dar peş] ast

16|64|Va [ej pajomʙar] in kitoʙro ʙar tu nozil nakardem, magar ʙaroi in ki [haqiqati] on ciro, ki [mardum] dar on ixtilof dorand, ʙarojaşon ʙajon kunī va hidojatu rahmate ʙoşad ʙaroi gurūhe, ki imon meovarand

16|65|Va Alloh taolo az osmon oʙe furū firistod va ʙo on zaminro pas az xazon va xuşkiaş zinda kard. Hatman, dar in amr ʙaroi mardume, ki [suxani haqro] meşunavand, nişonae [az qudrati Parvardigor] ast
